Description: Category of metadata manifest; provide the same one for all items/rows.

Note: Automatically filled when using the curator app.

Description: The type of resource being stored and annotated
The author of the resource; preferably use an ORCID ID, GitHub profile link, etc., if available and a text name if not.
Link to a license or name of license applicable for the resource.
Brief free-text comments that may also be important to understanding the resource.
